reviewText: Dinner for Schmucks is bad, but hey, watch the outtakes reel and enjoy it. If you warm up with that (on YouTube) you'll lol a few times during this one. I Love You Man is hilarious classic Paul Rudd.
i bought this purely for Dinner for Schmucks, have yet to watch the other film. Good price regardless if the other film is good or not
Perfect combo!!! I loved both of these movies and glad I now own them. These guys are hilarious!! Must haves

Not happy. I like both of these moviea a lot. I was mainly buying the set because of dinner for schmucks; however, the movie skips throughout. Sometimes the skips are to the point of having to skip the entire scene. I didn't drop scratch or smudge the disc. I cleaned the dvd player,  and the diac and I still get the same problem. Now because I didn't have time to watch the movie before the return window I am stuck with a dud of a movie. I love you man worka great though.

I love Movies.. All kinds.  * Except the creepy chop people up kind.. Both of these movies are fun, goofy and just great for those times when you want to just giggle.. It's healthy to be able to silly up.. These movies are best enjoyed with Homemade popcorn, Not the microwavey kind.. LOL
I love both of these movies. The double feature for less that buying the movie by itself was a bonus.
